text: The following lists the events of the 1920 Philadelphia Phillies season. == Offseason == * January 12, 1920: Mack Wheat was purchased by the Phillies from the Brooklyn Robins.Mack Wheat page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
